attr.title: Hurrican
attr.desc: Turrican port by Thrimbor. Blast your way through myriads of enemies, explore the secrets of nine massive worlds, and collect tons of powerups to increase your firepower in this highly explosive Run and Gun arcade game.
attr.inst: Just add the data and lang folders from here to the ports/hurrican folder or just launch Hurrican from the ports menu in Emulationstation and it will download the files and install them automatically.
